newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Avon Products buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Avon Products buy repeated.

text.p: -- Rodman & Renshaw Inc on Thursday reiterated its buy rating on Avon Products Inc, a cosmetics and personal-care company.
-- In late March, the company will introduce a product category called Avon Home, offering table-top and home decorative products, and such items as linens.

-- "We believe this major new product entry will enable Avon to further leverage its direct selling organization while offering excellent product at value prices to consumers," Rodman & Renshaw said in a report.
-- The firm's estimate for Avon's first-quarter earnings is $0.31 a share.
-- Avon shares were off 1-5/8 at 58-1/8 in early afternoon trading.
